intro: Leptochloa chloridiformis, commonly known as the green panicgrass, is a grass species native to tropical and subtropical regions. It is characterized by its slender,丛生 growth habit and narrow, linear leaves that are usually smooth and hairless. Due to its adaptability, it is sometimes considered an invasive species in certain regions.
